nrqlQueries.query: FROM Metric SELECT latest(device_name) AS 'Device Name', latest(src_addr) AS 'Device IP', latest(kentik.snmp.Uptime)/8640000 AS 'Uptime (Days)', latest(SysObjectID) AS 'SysObjectID', latest(entity.type) AS 'NR Entity Type', latest(instrumentation.name) AS 'Ktranslate Profile', latest(timestamp) AS 'Last Update', latest(PollingHealth) AS 'Polling Health', latest(PollingHealthReason) AS 'Health Reason' WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Current CPU Utilization %' WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway'
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Current Memory Utilization %' WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway'
FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Min CPU', max(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Max CPU', average(kentik.snmp.CPU) AS 'Average CPU' WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT min(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Min Memory', max(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Max Memory', average(kentik.snmp.MemoryUtilization) AS 'Average Memory' WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusConnectionsAcceptedOneMinute) AS 'Accepted Connections - Last 1 Minute' WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway' COMPARE WITH 1 HOUR AGO
FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.SystemUsage) AS 'Current System Usage %' WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway'

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusEnvironmentalSensorsPowerSupply) AS 'Current PSU Status' FACET concat('Current PSU Status - ', dpStatusEnvironmentalSensorsPowerSupply) WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway'

FROM Metric SELECT latest(dpStatusLogTargetStatusStatus) AS 'Status', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusLogTargetStatusEventsProcessed) AS 'Processed', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusLogTargetStatusEventsDropped) AS 'Dropped', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusLogTargetStatusEventsPending) AS 'Pending', latest(dpStatusLogTargetStatusErrorInfo) AS 'Error Info' FACET dpStatusLogTargetStatusLogTarget AS 'Log Target' WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway' LIMIT MAX

FROM Metric SELECT ( ( average(kentik.snmp.dpStatusFilesystemStatusTotalEncrypted) - average(kentik.snmp.dpStatusFilesystemStatusFreeEncrypted) ) / average(kentik.snmp.dpStatusFilesystemStatusTotalEncrypted) ) * 100 AS 'Encrypted Utilization %', ( ( average(kentik.snmp.dpStatusFilesystemStatusTotalTemporary) - average(kentik.snmp.dpStatusFilesystemStatusFreeTemporary) ) / average(kentik.snmp.dpStatusFilesystemStatusTotalTemporary) ) * 100 AS 'Temporary Utilization %', ( ( average(kentik.snmp.dpStatusFilesystemStatusTotalInternal) - average(kentik.snmp.dpStatusFilesystemStatusFreeInternal) ) / average(kentik.snmp.dpStatusFilesystemStatusTotalInternal) ) * 100 AS 'Internal Utilization %' WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway' TIMESERIES 5 MINUTES

FROM Metric SELECT latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummaryEstablished) AS 'Established', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummaryListen) AS 'Listen', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummaryClosed) AS 'Closed', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummaryClosing) AS 'Closing', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummaryClosedWait) AS 'Closed-Wait', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummaryLastAck) AS 'Last-Ack', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummarySynSent) AS 'Syn-Sent', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummarySynReceived) AS 'Syn-Received', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummaryFinWait1) AS 'Fin-Wait-1', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummaryFinWait2) AS 'Fin-Wait-2', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusTCPSummaryTimeWait) AS 'Time-Wait'WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway'

FROM Metric SELECT latest(dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusAdminStatus) AS 'Admin Status', latest(dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusOperStatus) AS 'Oper Status', rate(max(kentik.snmp.dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusRxHCBytes)/1000/1000, 1 SECOND) AS 'RX Mbps', rate(max(kentik.snmp.dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusRxHCPackets), 1 SECOND) AS 'RX Pps', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusRxErrors2) AS 'RX Errors', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusRxDrops2) AS 'RX Drops', rate(max(kentik.snmp.dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusTxHCBytes)/1000/1000, 1 SECOND) AS 'TX Mbps', rate(max(kentik.snmp.dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusTxHCPackets), 1 SECOND) AS 'TX Pps', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusTxErrors2) AS 'TX Errors', latest(kentik.snmp.dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusTxDrops2) AS 'TX Drops'FACET dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusName AS 'Name', dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusInterfaceType AS 'Type', dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusIP AS 'IP', dpStatusNetworkInterfaceStatusMACAddress AS 'MAC' WHERE provider = 'kentik-datapower-gateway' LIMIT MAX
